long_description: The Nite Ize Connect cradle lets you attach your Connect Case for iPhone(R) 4/4S (sold separately) to a vehicle vent or create a desk stand or docking station on any smooth, flat surface. Sturdy Lexan(R) polycarbonate cradle features durable and flexible rubber twist-tie attachment arms that can be configured a multitude of ways. Bend the arms at right angles and hook the case through a car's dashboard vent to easily view maps and voice-activate Siri while keeping your iPhone connected to accessories. Bend the arms at the base of the cradle to create an instant tabletop stand for easy viewing at home or the office. When you want to pocket your iPhone, simply bend the arms back over the clip and and it will fit flat in your pocket. The Nite Ize Connect cradle comes with 2 high-temperature, adhesive, rip-and-stick strips that let you create a semi-permanent docking location.
short_description: The Nite Ize Connect cradle lets you attach your Connect Case for iPhone(R) 4/4S (sold separately) to a vehicle vent or create a desk stand or docking station on any smooth, flat surface.
